sentences.en: All other Python code is allowed inside a transaction function.
sentences.cn: 允许在事务函数内包含其它的Python代码.

sentences.en: But this dismisses a vast library of prior and future Python art.
sentences.cn: 但这样就抛弃了大量历史的和将来的Python库.

sentences.en: Fat does a heart good—at least if you're a python, a new study says.
sentences.cn: 一项新研究得出的结论是，脂肪对心脏是有好处的——如果你是一条巨蟒的话。

sentences.en: In such cases, Python may be just the language for you.
sentences.cn: 遇到以上情况, Python可能 就是你要找的语言.

sentences.en: Incidentally, knowledge about this subject is useful for any advanced Python programmer.
sentences.cn: 另外, 这一切的知识对于任何高级Python程序员都非常有用.

sentences.en: Infact zope and zope developers has influenced Python language itself.
sentences.cn: 事实上zope和zope开发人员也影响了Python语言自身.

sentences.en: Introduce how to develop interface of weather server using Python toolkit PyQt.
sentences.cn: 介绍了使用Python下的图形工具包PyQt开发 气象服务器用户图形界面的方法.

sentences.en: It is the Python interpreter waiting for you to tell it what to do.
sentences.cn: 它是Python的翻译器等候你要他做什么.

sentences.en: Jones I think we've all relaxed a bit about Python.
sentences.cn: Jones:我想我们关于Python这个 话题都已经放得开了.

sentences.en: Jython is an open source implementation of Python combining with Java platform.
sentences.cn: Jython是Python编程语言结合Java平台的一种开源执行.

sentences.en: Jython is not fully compatible with the standard Python language.
sentences.cn: Jython与标准Python语言并非完全兼容.

sentences.en: Most standard Python libraries have been ported to Jython, and others are being adopted regularly.
sentences.cn: 大多数标准Python库已经移植到Jython, 并且其它的库也正在定期地被采纳.

sentences.en: Python enables programs to be written compactly and readably.
sentences.cn: Python可以写出很紧凑和可读性很强的程序.

sentences.en: Python is just the language for you.
Python strings are immutable sequences of bytes or characters.
sentences.cn: Python中的字符串是不可变的字符或字节的序列.

sentences.en: SITTBOW, Cambodia (Reuters) - Cambodians are flocking to see a three-year-old boy they believe was the son of a dragon in a former life because his best friend is a four-meter-long python.
sentences.cn: 柬埔寨，路透社-柬埔寨人都成群结队去观看一个三岁的小男孩，由于小男孩最好的朋友是一条四米长的巨蟒，人们认为小孩前生是一条龙的儿子。

sentences.en: Yes! it is one of the gratest Python application ever written.
sentences.cn: 是的, 它是最伟大的Python应用之一.

trans.tran_en: a large tropical snake that kills animals for food by winding itself around them and crushing them
